key_risks: Legal and regulatory risks including employment disputes, contract disputes, and eviction proceedings
Ethical and social concerns such as tenant complaints and affordability criticism
Environmental and safety issues including building safety violations and apartment fire litigation
controversies: Labor and employment case filed by Christina Williams
Contract dispute with Double Eagle over invoicing and work performed
Class-action lawsuits related to a 2015 apartment fire in New Jersey
environmental_issues: Building safety violations and unsafe working conditions during construction
social_issues: Tenant complaints about high early termination fees, poor living conditions, and inadequate customer service
Affordability criticism due to rising rental prices
governance_issues: Legal disputes and regulatory scrutiny over financial transparency and vendor relationships
